name: Blockhouse
description: A small, fortified building serves as a defensive position and observation post. The strategic location provides excellent visibility and control, while the limited space restricts long-term habitation and makes it vulnerable to siege.
atmosphere: Small stone fortress commands strategic views through narrow arrow slits while signal equipment enables communication with distant posts. Thick walls house essential supplies and weapons for the small garrison. The air carries stone dust, weapon oil, and isolation. Multiple firing positions cover all approaches to the vital position.
